name: Killing Stone
text:
If your J/ruler isn't "Lilas Petal, Agent of Salvation" or "The Nine-Tailed Fox", this card enters your field rested unless you pay 300 life.
Treat this card as a wind magic stone and a darkness magic stone.
T: Produce G or B.
When this card is put into a graveyard from your field â‡’ Your opponent loses 100 life and you gain 100 life.
